offenseval2020-turkish.description: OffensEval-TR 2020 is a Turkish offensive language corpus. The corpus consist of randomly sampled tweets, and annotated in a similar way to OffensEval and GermEval.
offenseval2020-turkish.citation:

 author  = {Cagri Coltekin},
 year  = {2020},
 title  = {A Corpus of Turkish Offensive Language on Social Media},
 booktitle  = {Proceedings of The 12th Language Resources and Evaluation Conference},
 pages  = {6174--6184},
 address  = {Marseille, France},
 url  = {https://www.aclweb.org/anthology/2020.lrec-1.758},
}
